Title: Thunderhead Butt
Description:
Durzan looks hale and hearty again. That moss packs a real punch.

I have a sense that he's ready to go. I just wish we had more time. I have so many questions. But the greatest of those questions will be answered when he reaches the peak.

We shouldn't send him up there alone. But I think he trusts you to take him.
ObjectivesText: Accompany Durzan to Belzt on Thunderhead Peak.
CompletionText: We'll be watching from here. I truly hope Belzt is up there waiting.
RewardText:
The legends were true. The storms, the rooks, and these rams. They're all connected.

I have so much more to learn. But thank you for setting me on this path.
